endpoints.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of patient records accessible to the requesting healthcare provider.
Add a new patient record to the Electronic Health Records system.
Fetch detailed information for a specific patient using their unique identifier.
Update the patient record with the provided unique identifier.
Retrieve a list of all lab results associated with the specified patient.
Add new lab results to a patient's record.
Fetch a list of medications prescribed to the specified patient.
Add a new medication record to the specified patient's profile.
Obtain a list of scheduled appointments for the given patient.
Schedule a new appointment for the specified patient.
